## Libraries

```{r, include=TRUE}
library(GGally)
```


## Setup
```{r, include=TRUE}
a <- read.csv("../datasets/A.csv")
dim(a)
head(a, 5)
```

## Plots


```{r, include=TRUE}
plot(a$date, a$open, xlab="dates", ylab="stock price-opening")
plot(a$date, a$close, xlab="dates", ylab="stock price-closing")

```



```{r, include=TRUE}
fit.1 <- lm(close ~ open, data=a) 
summary(fit.1)
coef(fit.1)
```

## GG Pairs
```{r, include=TRUE}

a.gg <- a[, c("volume", "high", "low", "open", "close", "adjclose")]

babies <- na.omit(read.csv('babies.csv'))
babies$parity <- as.factor(babies$parity)
babies$smoke <- as.factor(babies$smoke)
babies.dat <- babies[, c("gestation", "parity", "age", "height","weight", "smoke", "bwt")]
ggpairs(data = babies.dat)
ggcorr(data = babies.dat, label = TRUE)
```
